fields.description: Blau and Kahn (2017) decompose the gender wage gap into the contribution of particular labor-market characteristics. Specifically, it shows the fraction of the total gender wage gap accounted for by gender differences for the full specification of variables, based on the Oaxacaâ€“Blinder decomposition.

fields.name: Female to Male log Wage Ratio (Blau and Kahn (2017))
fields.description: The unadjusted wage ratio is the mean female to male log hourly wage ratio for full-time workers. The adjusted female to male wage ratios decompose differences in log wages into a portion accounting for differences due to characteristics, and the other due to an unexplained component - often cited to be discrimination.
